Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: The design used for the boost gauge.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Determines whether or not Tails Save should be used in place of lives.

Elements.Name: ringLifeType
Description: Determines whether or not collecting 100 rings should give you an extra life.

Elements.Name: forceDisableNavi
Description: Determines whether or not the navigator is forced off - this can be useful if you made progress on a save with the navigator turned on, as there's no way to disable it in-game.
Uses the boost gauge design from Sonic Colours.
Uses the boost gauge design from Sonic Colours: Ultimate.
Disables Tails Save and restores the life counter.
Don't reward an extra life for collecting 100 rings.
Only reward an extra life once when collecting exactly 100 rings.
Always reward extra lives when collecting 100 rings.
